localizedMeta.description:
南極大陸横断を目指して走り抜ける
爽快ランニング＆ジャンピングアクションゲーム！

シンプルな操作でどこまでも走り続けろ！
丘を越え谷を越え、崩れゆく地面を走り抜けて

コンテンツ容量:6737 KB

プレイ人数:1人

対応機能:
- タッチスクリーン

対応言語:
英語(アメリカ)/英語(イギリス)/日本語

著作権等:
Copyright (C) 2012 BoobyTrap.,Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

Run and jump to make your way across Antarctica in this thrilling, action-packed game!

Using the simple controls, keep on running and don't look back! Bound over hills and barrel through valleys, but beware of the ground crumbling away at your feet!

Package size: 6737 KB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1Player(S)

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Japanese

Copyright (C) 2012 BoobyTrap.,Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

Run and jump to make your way across Antarctica in this thrilling, action-packed game!
